commit.message:
implement an SSZ state download `/teku/v1/beacon/blocks/:block_id/state`

 - allows the download of an SSZ state given a block root, which is helpful for weak subjectivity.

 - if slot, finalized, genesis, or head are specified, the behaviour is identical to `/teku/v1/beacon/states/:state_id`, but when a root is specified, it is the block root being specified rather than the state root.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>
